SELECT TENANT_ID , MENU_ID , SYSTEM_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_ENG_NM , MENU_DESC , MENU_DEPTH , INFR_MENU_YN , UP_MENU_ID , EXPO_ORD , TARGET_URL , SEARCH_FILE_PATH , SEARCH_FILE_NM , LNB_FILE_PATH , LNB_FILE_NM , LNB_FILE_SIZE , BODY_FILE_PATH , BODY_FILE_NM , BODY_FILE_SIZE , MAIN_ON_FILE_PATH , MAIN_ON_FILE_NM , MAIN_OFF_FILE_PATH , MAIN_OFF_FILE_NM , RANK_FILE_PATH , RANK_FILE_NM , USE_YN , REG_ID , REG_DT , UPD_ID , UPD_DT FROM TB_DP_TENANT_MENU WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND MENU_ID = #{menuId} AND SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(MENU_ID) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT, MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_DESC, BODY_FILE_SIZE FROM TB_DP_TENANT_MENU WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND MENU_ID = #{menuId} AND SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} AND MENU_DEPTH = 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY EXPO_ORD

SELECT COUNT(MENU_ID) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT, MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_DESC, BODY_FILE_SIZE, MENU_DEPTH, EXPO_ORD FROM ( SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_DESC, BODY_FILE_SIZE, MENU_DEPTH, EXPO_ORD FROM TB_DP_TENANT_MENU WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} START WITH MENU_ID = #{menuId} CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_ID = UP_MENU_ID ) GROUP BY MENU_ID, MENU_NM, MENU_DESC, BODY_FILE_SIZE, MENU_DEPTH, EXPO_ORD ORDER BY MENU_ID, MENU_DEPTH, EXPO_ORD
